statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT airport_code, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE airport_code = 123
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM WeatherData WHERE airport_code = 123 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 70 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY humidity ASC, wind_speed DESC
SELECT airport_code, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM WeatherData GROUP BY airport_code ORDER BY airport_code
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records FROM WeatherData WHERE wind_speed > 15
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT AVG(temperature), location_name FROM WeatherData GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT pilot_name, arrival_time FROM FlightLogs WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT location_name, visibility FROM WeatherData WHERE visibility < 5 ORDER BY visibility;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE visibility > 5 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location_name, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 AND visibility > 3 ORDER BY wind_speed ASC
SELECT * FROM FlightLogs WHERE distance > 500 ORDER BY departure_time ASC
SELECT pilot_name, arrival_time FROM FlightLogs WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM flight_logs ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT pilot_id, name, age FROM pilot_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT name, age, experience_years FROM pilot_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT flight_number, departure_location, arrival_location, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flight_logs WHERE arrival_location = 'New York' AND departure_time BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM pilot_info WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pilot_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location, temperature FROM weather_stations JOIN temperature_data ON weather_stations.station_id = temperature_data.station_id;
SELECT flight_id, departure, destination, planned_departure_time FROM flight_plans WHERE planned_departure_time > NOW();
SELECT station_name, wind_speed, wind_direction FROM weather_stations JOIN wind_data ON weather_stations.station_id = wind_data.station_id;
SELECT * FROM weather_stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_stations WHERE station_id = 2 AND location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE station_id = 3;
SELECT station_name, wind_speed FROM weather_stations JOIN wind_data ON weather_stations.station_id = wind_data.station_id WHERE wind_speed > 20;
SELECT flight_id, departure, destination, planned_departure_time FROM flight_plans WHERE planned_departure_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planned_departure_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT airport_code, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM FlightPlans WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pilot_id, name, experience_years FROM PilotData ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT model, manufacturer, max_speed, max_altitude FROM AircraftData WHERE max_speed > 500;
SELECT flight_id, pilot_id, aircraft_id, departure_datetime, arrival_datetime FROM FlightLogs WHERE pilot_id = '1234';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT airport_code, temperature, wind_speed FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT flight_id, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM FlightPlans WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT pilot_id, name, age, experience_years FROM PilotData WHERE experience_years > 5 AND license_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT aircraft_id, model, manufacturer, max_speed, max_altitude FROM AircraftData WHERE max_speed > 500 ORDER BY max_speed DESC LIMIT 3;
